benchmark_details.name: Court Views Generation (CVG) dataset
benchmark_details.overview: This paper introduces a new English-language CVG dataset based on the US case law database, designed to enhance the interaction of legal large language models (LLMs) with users seeking legal assistance.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a structured and comprehensive dataset for generating accurate court views in legal contexts.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The dataset is specifically designed for US legal cases and may not be universally applicable across different jurisdictions.

data.source: US legal documents derived from the Caselaw Access Project.
data.size: 19,491 training examples, 2,436 development examples, 2,437 test examples
data.annotation: Reviewed and validated by three legal professionals.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated using standard natural language processing evaluation techniques.
methodology.interpretation: Higher ROUGE and BLEU scores indicate more accurate and coherent court views generated by the model.
methodology.baseline_results: D3LM achieved ROUGE scores: R-1 63.3%, R-2 53.1%, R-L 59.2%.
methodology.validation: The dataset's integrity is ensured through meticulous review by legal professionals.
